sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { NotificationService } from '../../core/services/notification.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-policy-new', template: `

New Insurance Policy

Create a new insurance policy for your vehicle.

Vehicle Information

License Plate License plate is required Vehicle Make Toyota Honda Nissan Mazda Isuzu Mitsubishi Vehicle make is required
Vehicle Model Vehicle model is required Year {{year}} Year is required

Coverage Options

Coverage Type Third Party Only Comprehensive Coverage type is required Coverage Amount (THB) 1,000,000 2,000,000 3,000,000 5,000,000 Coverage amount is required

Premium Calculation

Base Premium: {{ basePremium | currency:'THB':'symbol-narrow' }}
Coverage Premium: {{ coveragePremium | currency:'THB':'symbol-narrow' }}
Total Annual Premium: {{ estimatedPremium | currency:'THB':'symbol-narrow' }}
`, styles: [` .policy-new-container { padding: 24px; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; } .form-section h2 { margin-bottom: 16px; color: #333; } .form-row { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 16px; } .form-actions { display: flex; gap: 16px; justify-content: flex-end; margin-top: 24px; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .form-row { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .form-actions { flex-direction: column; } } `] }) export class PolicyNewComponent { }
